name: Developers Roguelike
description:
Developers Roguelike

I hope you like my game, please give me some feedback.

If you find any bugs, then please let me know.

The game has no instructions build in, so il brief you here.
Click a player, click an enemy, press an attack. It's simple!
Each player can attack once per turn

And btw, the damage you deal to the enemy is based of your attack - enemys defense.

I've gotten a little help with the art from my brother and cousin.
